name: Aspect of the Cursed Aura
description: A dark aura surrounds you, inflicting Decrepify and Iron Maiden on enemies who touch it. Curses inflicted this way spread to surrounding targets every [2.5 - 0.3] seconds and last 4 seconds outside of the aura.

name: Aspect of Apogeic Furor
description: Casting an Ultimate Skill increases your Ultimate damage by [6.0 - 10.0]%%[x], up to [60 - 100]%%[x]. At 10 stacks, your Cooldowns and this bonus are reset.

name: Clandestine Aspect
description: Gain +[3 - 5] to Agility and Subterfuge Skills.

name: Wildbolt Aspect
description: Every [3.5 - 2.0] seconds, Distant enemies are Pulled In to you and take 10%%[x] increased damage for 3 seconds. This effect cannot occur while you are in Stealth.

name: Tidal Aspect
description: Blood Wave fires two additional waves, each dealing [40 - 100]%% of normal damage, but you can no longer recast it until the last wave ends.

name: Aspect of Star Shards
description: Knives from Dance of Knives have a 50%% chance to shatter into 6 shards of metal on hit, dealing [150 - 300] Physical damage.Dance of Knives now spends Combo Points, granting up to 3 additional Charges that can exceed the Maximum.

name: Aspect of Occult Dominion
description: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors and Skeletal Mages is increased by 2.

name: Vehement Brawler's Aspect
description: Casting an Ultimate Skill increases your damage by [10 - 30]%%[x] for 8 seconds. Gain 2 additional Ultimate Skill Ranks.

name: Executioner's Aspect
description: Your Overpowers will spawn an Earthquake every 4 seconds that deals [300 - 602] Physical damage over 4 seconds. Your Earthquake damage is increased by 5%%[x] for every 100 Strength you have, up to 200%%[x].Current Bonus: 0%%[x]

name: Aspect of Redirected Force
description: Gain increased Critical Strike Damage equal to [30 - 70]%%[x] of your Block Chance. Blocking doubles this bonus for 10 seconds.

name: Aspect of the Great Feast
description: While you have active Minions, your Summons deal [30 - 45]%%[x] increased damage, but each Minion drains 1 Essence from you per second. While you have no active Minions, you deal [30 - 45]%%[x] increased damage, but you lose 7 Essence per second.

name: Aspect of Elements
description: Gain [15 - 35]%%[x] increased damage to a set of damage types for 7 seconds.  This effect alternates between 2 sets: Fire, Lightning, and Physical. Cold, Poison, and Shadow.

name: Aspect of the Orange Herald
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a [5.0 - 13.0]%% chance to reduce the Cooldown of your Ultimate Skill by 2 seconds. Can only happen once per Skill cast.

name: Flamethrower's Aspect
description: Incinerate splits into 3 beams, each dealing [70 - 90]%%[x] of normal damage.

name: Aspect of Delayed Extinction
description: Mighty Throw and Steel Grasp now gain multiplicative damage instead of cooldown from Cooldown Reduction and their damage is increased by another [125 - 250]%%[x].

name: Aspect of Anger Management
description: While above [55 - 40] Fury, you are Berserk, but lose 2 Fury per second.

name: Aspect of Incendiary Fissures
description: Your Earthquakes deal [40 - 60]%%[x] increased damage and their damage is converted into Fire.

name: Aspect of Falling Feathers
description: Moving with a Mobility Skill or Evade spawns Storm Feathers along behind you.Storm Feathers now drop from the sky as they are spawned, each dealing [113 - 225] Lightning damage on impact.

name: Aspect of True Sight
description: You deal [70 - 110]%%[x] increased Critical Strike Damage to enemies marked by Inner Sight. While Inner Sight is full, you gain [35 - 55]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Aspect of the Damned
description: You deal [35 - 55]%%[x] increased Shadow damage to enemies afflicted by any Curse.

name: Aspect of Splintering Energy
description: Critical Hits with Lightning Spear cause the spear to arc to the target and up to 5 other enemies. This damage is increased by [60 - 100]%%[x] of your Critical Strike Damage Bonus.

name: Aspect of Ultimate Shadow
description: Bone Storm and Blood Wave are also Darkness Skills, deal Shadow damage, and gain additional effects:  Enemies damaged by Bone Storm take [120 - 420] Corrupting damage over 2 seconds.  Blood Wave creates Desecrated Ground as it travels, dealing [1,920 - 6,720] Corrupting damage over 4 seconds

name: Aspect of Unyielding Hits
description: Casting a Gorilla Skill increases your Weapon Damage by [10 - 30]%% of your Armor for 3 seconds. Maximum 1,500 bonus Weapon Damage.

name: Dust Devil's Aspect
description: Whirlwind leaves behind Dust Devils that deal [120 - 210] damage to enemies in their path. Enemies hit by Dust Devils take 25%%[x] increased damage from all of your other sources for 3 seconds.

name: Aspect of Earthquakes
description: Ground Stomp creates an Earthquake damaging enemies for [167 - 287] Physical damage over 4 seconds. While standing in Earthquakes and for 4 seconds afterwards, you deal [20 - 60]%%[x] increased damage.Your Earthquakes deal [20 - 60]%% increased damage.

name: Battle-Mad Aspect
description: Gain [20 - 40]%%[x] increased damage and Berserking for 4 seconds after swapping weapons 8 times.

name: Lightning Rod Aspect
description: Chain Lightning has a 25%% chance to deal [50 - 90]%%[x] increased damage. This chance is doubled against Bosses or Crowd Controlled enemies and prefers them as targets.

name: Shivering Aspect
description: Enemies take up to [35 - 55]%%[x] increased damage based on how much they are Chilled or Staggering. You apply 15%% more Chill.

name: Aspect of Service and Sacrifice
description: Skeleton Warriors explode on death, dealing [300 - 450] Physical damage to surrounding enemies. They lose 25%% Life per second while in combat.Skeleton Mages take 90%% less damage and deal [50.0 - 100.0]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Aspect of Artful Initiative
description: When you spend 75 Energy you release a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades that deal [78 - 168] total Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1.00 seconds.Your Stun Grenades deal [25 - 45]%% increased damage.

name: Aspect of Imitated Imbuement
description: Your Shadow Clones also mimic the Imbuements applied to your Skills. Casting an Imbuement Skill grants your active Shadow Clone [5 - 25]%%[x] increased damage for 9 seconds.

name: Battle Caster's Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: When your Conjuration Skills hit you have up to a [25 - 45]%% chance to gain +1 Rank to your Conjuration skills for 12 seconds.  This can stack up to 5 times.

name: Sacrificial Aspect
description: Your Sacrifice bonuses are increased by [35 - 55]%%.

name: Opportunist's Aspect
description: When you enter or break Stealth, you drop a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades around you that deal [180 - 270] total Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1.00 second.Your Stun Grenades deal [25 - 45]%% increased damage.

name: Aspect of Quickening Fog
description: You automatically drop a Smoke Grenade at the end of Dash. Smoke Grenades reduce Dash's Cooldown by [0.50 - 0.70] seconds for each enemy hit, up to [1.50 - 2.10] seconds.

name: Auric
description: +[9.0 - 10.8]%% Resistance to All Elements

name: Aspect of Overheating
description: After channeling Incinerate for 2 seconds it deals [75 - 100]%%[x] increased damage for 5 seconds. Casting Incinerate refreshes and maintains this bonus.

name: Aspect of Accursed Touch
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a [20.0 - 40.0]%% chance for your Skills to inflict Vampiric Curse on enemies. Enemies afflicted with Vampiric Curse are also Vulnerable.Vampiric Curse's stored souls deal [20.0 - 60.0]%% increased damage.

name: Unyielding Commander's Aspect
description: While Army of the Dead is active, your Minions take 90%% reduced damage and you deal [70 - 110]%%[x] increased Summon Damage.

name: Hectic Aspect
description: After casting 5 Basic Skills, one of your active Cooldowns is reduced by [1.0 - 2.5] seconds.

name: Aspect of Recalling Feathers
description: Casting a Focus Skill recalls all Nearby Storm Feathers, dealing [113 - 225] Lightning damage to enemies along their way. If there are no Nearby Storm Feathers, the cast instead spawns 10 randomly around you.

name: Menacing Aspect
description: Scourge continuously affects enemies around you for [5.0 - 9.0] seconds.

name: Adept
description: +[3.0 - 8.0]%% Critical Strike Chance

name: Blood Boiling Aspect
description: When your Core Skills Overpower any number of enemies, you spawn 3 Volatile Blood Drops. Collecting a Volatile Blood Drop causes it to explode, dealing [263 - 938] Physical damage around you. Every 20 seconds, your next Skill is guaranteed to Overpower.

name: Aspect of Electrified Claws
description: Shapeshifting into a new animal form causes a Lightning Bolt to strike a Nearby enemy dealing 600 Lightning damage.Your Lightning Bolts deal [20 - 40]%%[x] increased damage and Stun for 2 seconds.

name: Determined
description: +[42 - 52] Willpower

name: Storm Swell Aspect
description: You deal [15 - 35]%%[x] increased damage while Ice Armor is active. This amount is increased by another 0%%[x] against Frozen enemies.

name: Ruthless Aspect
description: Your Critical Strike Chance with Jaguar Skills is increased by 15%%[+] and [1.0 - 11.0]%%[+] for each 10%% of an enemy's missing Life.

name: Fell Soothsayer's Aspect
description: When you cast an Incarnate Skill enemies around you become Vulnerable for 5 seconds. Killing a Vulnerable enemy echoes [15 - 55]%% of the killing blow's damage to another Nearby enemy.

name: Aspect of Impending Deluge
description: Storm Strike's chains to twice as many targets and increases the damage the targets take from your other Skills by [30 - 50]%%[x] for 6 seconds.

name: Aspect of Shredding Blades
description: Ice Blades' chance to apply Vulnerable is increased by 20%%[+] and the Vulnerable duration is increased by 4 seconds. You gain [15 - 35]%%[x] Vulnerable Damage.

name: Reaper's Aspect
description: Enemies you Poison have 100%% Reduced Healing and your Eagle Skills gain [10 - 30]%%[+] increased Critical Strike Chance against them.

name: Aspect of Plains Power
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 25%%[+] chance to create a Mystic Circle for 10 seconds. Casting a Jaguar Skill in Mystic Circles empowers them to keep your Ferocity at Maximum and increase your damage by [2.0 - 5.0]%%[x] per stack while you remain within.

name: Aspect of Stolen Vigor
description: While at maximum stacks of the Momentum Key Passive, your Cutthroat Skills deal [30 - 50]%% increased damage and you become Unstoppable for 3 seconds every 6 seconds.

name: Aspect of Shared Misery
description: Lucky Hit: When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a [35 - 55]%% chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.

name: Immobilizing
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a +[7.0 - 12.0]%% Chance to Immobilize for 2 Seconds

name: Windlasher Aspect
description: Casting Double Swing creates a Dust Devil that deals [53 - 83] damage to enemies in its path.

name: Aspect of Conflagration
description: While channeling Incinerate, your Burning damage is increased by [25 - 45]%%[x]. Enemies damaged by Incinerate explode, Burning all surrounding enemies for [120 - 420] over 6 seconds. Can only occur once every 3 seconds.

name: Aspect of Reanimation
description: Your Minions gain increased damage while alive, up to [25 - 45]%%[x] after 10 seconds.

name: Aspect of Ancestral Charge
description: Casting Charge Summons 4 Ancients to Charge with you, each dealing [20 - 40]%%[x] of normal damage.Your Summons deal [20 - 40]%% increased damage.

name: Duelist's Aspect
description: Maximum Ferocity increased by [1 - 5].

name: Aspect of Inevitable Fate
description: When an enemy falls below 35%% Life while afflicted with any of your damage over time effects, an explosion occurs every 7 seconds, dealing [300 - 525] damage for each Element they're afflicted by.

name: Edgemaster's Aspect
description: Skills deal up to [5 - 25]%%[x] increased damage based on your available Primary Resource when cast, receiving the maximum benefit while you have full Primary Resource.

name: Aspect of Creeping Death
description: You deal [5.0 - 20.0]%%[x] increased damage over time to enemies for each different Crowd Control effect they're afflicted by. Unstoppable enemies and Staggered Bosses take [10 - 40]%%[x] increased damage over time from you instead.

name: Rapid Aspect
description: Basic Skills gain [15 - 35]%%[+] Attack Speed.

name: Aphotic Aspect
description: Skeletal Priests empower your Skeletal Warriors' attacks to deal Shadow damage and have a [5.0 - 25.0]%% chance to Stun enemies for 1.5 seconds.

name: Sanctified
description: +[35.0 - 40.0]%% Shadow Resistance

name: Reaping Lotus' Aspect
description: Sever no longer returns and instead splits into 3 specters that expand out from its apex. Sever deals [140 - 200]%% of normal damage.

name: Aspect of Elemental Constellation
description: Casting Pyromancy, Shock, or Frost Skills conjures a matching Elemental Dagger around you that pierces through enemies dealing [75 - 1,575] damage after 3 seconds. The damage increases by 100%% per matching Elemental Skill you Cast.

name: Toxic Alchemist's Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: Shadow Imbued Skills have up to a 75%% chance to create a toxic explosion that applies [60 - 90] Poisoning damage over 5 seconds to the target and surrounding enemies. If they were already Poisoned, increase this damage by 100%%[x].

name: Aspect of the Frozen Tundra
description: While Deep Freeze is active, exploding Ice Spikes form in the area, dealing [150 - 195] Cold damage. Your Ice Spikes have a 50%% increased explosion radius.

name: Eluding Aspect
description: Becoming Injured while Crowd Controlled grants you Unstoppable for 4 seconds. This effect has a [40 - 20] second Cooldown.

name: Grounding
description: +[35.0 - 40.0]%% Lightning Resistance

name: Aspect of Turbulence
description: Soar casts Vortex at its landing location and deals [25 - 45]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Aspect of Mind's Awakening
description: Casting a Pyromancy Skill Immobilizes enemies hit for [0.5 - 1.0] seconds.Casting a Shock Skill grants a burst of [15.0 - 30.0]%% Movement Speed for 1 second.Casting a Frost Skill grants a Barrier for [3.0 - 6.0]%% of your Maximum Life for 5 seconds.While Enlightened, each Skill grants all benefits.

name: Aspect of Shattered Stars
description: Meteorites fall around Meteor, dealing [75 - 135] Fire damage.Your Meteorites gain [30 - 50]%% of Meteor's damage and Burn enemies for [135 - 225] damage over 6 seconds.

name: Bone Duster's Aspect
description: Bone Spear is guaranteed to Overpower enemies within Bone Prison and deals [30 - 50]%%[x] increased damage to them.

name: Aspect of Arrow Storms
description: Lucky Hit: Your Marksman and Cutthroat Skills have up to a 25%% chance to create an Arrow Storm at the enemy's location, dealing [156 - 486] Physical damage over 3 seconds. Your Arrow Storms deal [45 - 65]%% increased damage.

name: Aspect of Grasping Veins
description: Gain [5 - 25]%%[+] increased Critical Strike Chance for 6 seconds when you cast Corpse Tendrils. You deal [10 - 50]%%[x] bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies for 6 seconds after they are damaged by Corpse Tendrils.

name: Aspect of the Frozen Wake
description: While Ice Armor is active, you leave behind exploding Ice Spikes that deal [150 - 195] damage. Spawning an Ice Spike increases their damage by 3%%[x] for 2 seconds, up to 30 times.

name: Glacial Aspect
description: When you cast Blizzard it will periodically spawn exploding Ice Spikes that deal [150 - 195] damage. Your Ice Spikes Chill enemies for 15%%.

name: Aspect of Synergy
description: Using an Agility Skill reduces the Cooldown of your next Subterfuge Skill by 20%%. Using a Subterfuge Skill increases the damage of your next Agility Skill by [35 - 55]%%[x].

name: Coldclip Aspect
description: Your Basic Skills are always Cold Imbued.You deal [5 - 20]%%[x] increased damage to enemies who are Chilled or Frozen.

name: Shademist Aspect
description: Your Minions deal 38 Corrupting damage per second to enemies around them. The damage over time lasts for [2.0 - 5.0] seconds after leaving the aura.

name: Aspect of Apprehension
description: Once an enemy is Slowed by at least 80%%, they also become Feared for 3 seconds. You deal [20 - 40]%%[x] increased damage to Feared enemies.

name: Mired Sharpshooter's  Aspect
description: Caltrops is now also a Marksman Skill that also throws [5 - 25] piercing daggers over its duration, each dealing 15 Shadow damage and applying Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

name: Vampire's
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15%% Chance to Heal +[18 - 38] Life

name: Icy Alchemist's Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: Shadow Imbued Skills have up to a 75%% chance to release an explosion that deals [135 - 195] Cold damage to the target and surrounding enemies, Chilling them for 25%%. If they were already Chilled or Frozen, increase this damage by 100%%[x].

name: Aspect of Surprise
description: When you Evade or Shadow Step, you drop a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades that deal [90 - 270] total Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1.00 second.Your Stun Grenades deal [25 - 45]%% increased damage.

name: Trickster's Aspect
description: Caltrops, Smoke Grenade, and Death Trap receive your Stun Grenade benefits and throw Stun Grenades that deal [120 - 270] Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1 second.Your Stun Grenades deal [25 - 45]%% increased damage.

name: Seismic-shift Aspect
description: Earth Spike deals [50 - 70]%%[x] increased damage and launches spikes in a line.

name: Shockwave Aspect
description: Pulverize creates a shockwave that travels forward, dealing [80 - 120]%% of its damage to targets in the path.

name: Aspect of Bitter Infection
description: Enemies infected by Shadow Imbuement take [30 - 70]%%[x] of its damage every second. Shadow Imbuement deals [30 - 70]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Rip and Tear Aspect
description: Rushing Claw deals [10 - 30]%%[x] increased damage and is empowered based on how many Charges it has when you Cast it: 1: Heals 15%% of your Maximum Life. 2: Guaranteed to Overpower. 3: Guaranteed to Critically Strike. 4+: Strikes an additional time.

name: Assailing
description: +[4 - 6] to Flurry

name: Lightning Dancer's Aspect
description: Lightning Storm and Lightning Bolt Critical Strikes have a 50%% chance to spawn 3 Dancing Bolts that seek enemies in the area dealing [233 - 300] Lightning Damage. Your Dancing Bolts deal 30%%[x] increased damage.

name: Shadowslicer Aspect
description: Dash Summons a Shadow Clone that also casts Dash, dealing [150 - 350]%% of the Base damage.

name: Stormchaser's Aspect
description: Tornado will seek up to [1 - 5] targets and deals [30 - 50]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Blood Getter's Aspect
description: Your Skeletal Priests now also empower you at [55 - 75]%% effectiveness.

name: Aspect of the Alpha
description: Your Wolf Companions are now Werewolf Companions. Werewolf Companions deal [100 - 140]%%[x] additional damage and can spread Rabies.

name: Aspect of Piercing Cold
description: Ice Shards pierce 5 times and deals [35.0 - 50.0]%% increased damage, and an additional 10%%[x] more damage per subsequent enemy hit.

name: Aspect of Poisonous Clouds
description: When entering Stealth, create a cloud that deals [900 - 1,170] Poison damage over 6 seconds.

name: Aspect of the Expectant
description: After attacking enemies with a Basic Skill, increase the damage of your next Core Skill cast within 5 seconds by [5 - 12]%%[x], up to 30%%[x].

name: Stormshifter's Aspect
description: While Hurricane is active, gain +5 Ranks to your Shapeshifting Skills.

name: Aspect of Overwhelming Currents
description: Unstable Currents has a [25 - 45]%% chance to cast an additional Shock Skill.

name: Aspect of the Unbroken Tether
description: Chain Lightning has a [25 - 45]%% chance to chain 5 additional times.

name: Aspect of the Blurred Beast
description: Shred deals [55 - 75]%%[x] more damage, and Shred has a 33%% chance to land an additional strike, up to 4 times.

name: AttackSpeed UBERUNIQUE
description: +10.0%% Attack Speed

name: Seeker's
description: +[2 - 3] to Quill Volley

name: Runeworker's Conduit Aspect
description: Critical Strikes with Storm Skills cause Lightning Bolts to periodically strike close enemies for 3 seconds, each dealing [375 - 600] Lightning damage. Your Lightning Bolt damage is increased by 15%%[x] for every 100 Willpower you have.Current Bonus: 0%%[x]

name: Conceited Aspect
description: Deal [10 - 30]%%[x] increased damage while you have a Barrier active.

name: Blood-soaked Aspect
description: Blood Mist leaves a trail of Desecrated Ground that lasts for 4 seconds and deals [68 - 98] Corrupting damage per second. Gain 20%%[+] Movement Speed while Blood Mist is active.

name: Aspect of Armageddon
description: A hail of Meteorites falls during Inferno, dealing [75 - 135] Fire damage on impact. Your Meteorites Immobilize enemies for 4 seconds.While Inferno is active, your Meteorites deal [200 - 360]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Vengeful Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: Damaging a Vulnerable enemy has up to a 25%% chance to create an Arrow Storm at the enemy's location , dealing [156 - 486] Physical damage over 3 seconds. Your Arrow Storms deal [45 - 65]%% increased damage.

name: Aspect of Corruption
description: Your Imbuement Skill effects have [40 - 60]%%[x] increased potency.

name: Aspect of Branching Volleys
description: Increase the damage of arrows that ricochet from Barrage from 40%% to [50 - 90]%%. Barrage's arrows have a [30 - 70]%% chance to split into 2 arrows whenever they ricochet.

name: Aspect of Engulfing Flames
description: You deal 9%%[x] increased Burning damage to enemies for each second they remain Burning, up to 45%%[x] after 5 seconds. Additionally, you deal [10 - 30]%%[x] increased Burning damage to enemies that are not Healthy.

name: Opportunist's
description: +28.0%% Damage to Healthy Enemies

name: Aspect of Noxious Ice
description: Chilled enemies Poisoned by Poison Imbuement will be further Chilled for 20%% per second. You deal [20 - 40]%%[x] additional Poison damage to Frozen enemies.

name: Aspect of Binding Morass
description: Close enemies or those you deal indirect damage to are Slowed by [30 - 70]%% for 3 seconds. You deal [10 - 30]%% increased damage to Slowed enemies.

name: Aspect of Concussive Strikes
description: Your Daze effects last [20 - 40]%%[+] longer. Dazing an enemy increases your Movement Speed by [20 - 40]%%[+] for  3 seconds.

name: Aspect of Simple Reprisal
description: When you cast the 3rd attack of your Basic Skills you have a [10 - 30]%% chance to unleash Payback.

name: Relentless Berserker's Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy with a Core Skill has up to a [15 - 35]%% chance to extend the duration of Berserking by 2 seconds. Double this duration if it was a Critical Strike.

name: Aspect of Berserk Ripping
description: Whenever you deal direct damage while Berserking, inflict [15 - 35]%% of the Base damage dealt as additional Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

name: Aspect of Grasping Whirlwind
description: Whirlwind Pulls enemies to you every [6.0 - 3.0] seconds.

name: Aspect of Burning Rage
description: While Berserking, you deal [68 - 124] Fire damage every second to surrounding enemies.

name: Aspect of Retaliation
description: Your Core Skills deal up to [35 - 75]%%[x]  increased damage based on your amount of Fortify.

name: Serpentine Aspect
description: You may have 1 additional Hydra active, and Hydra's duration is increased by [10 - 30]%%.

name: Aspect of Frozen Memories
description: The Avalanche Key Passive now reduces the cost of Frost Skills by an additional 30%% and its damage to Vulnerable enemies is increased to [50 - 75]%%[x].

name: Focused
description: +[35.0 - 45.0]%% Critical Strike Damage

name: Sticker-thought Aspect
description: Gain [508 - 1,270] Thorns while Channeling and for 3 seconds afterwards.

name: Winter Touch Aspect
description: When you Freeze an enemy, you deal [225 - 450] Cold damage to them.This effect is treated as a Frost Skill.

name: Slice and Dice Aspect
description: Twisting Blades' initial hit cleaves. Twisting Blades return [25 - 45]%% faster.

name: Aspect of Contamination
description: Poison Trap bursts for [225 - 375] Poison damage when it triggers. If this burst Critically Strikes, you deal [20 - 40]%%[x] increased Poison damage for 5 seconds.

name: Smiting Aspect
description: You have [13 - 23]%%[+] increased Critical Strike Chance against Injured enemies. While you are Healthy, you gain [25 - 45]%%[+] increased Crowd Control Duration.

name: Aspect of Encircling Blades
description: Flurry damages enemies in a circle around you and deals [35 - 55]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Aspect of Bursting Venoms
description: Lucky Hit: Poison Imbued Skills have up to a 15%% chance to create a toxic pool that deals [420 - 546] Poisoning damage over 3 seconds to enemies within. While standing in the pool, your Poison Imbuement Skill has no Cooldown and no Charge limit.

name: Aspect of the Void
description: Blight's defiled area Pulls In enemies and has a [35 - 55]%% chance to Stun them for 3 seconds when it appears.

name: Aspect of the Stampede
description: Gain 1 additional Companion. In addition, your Companion Skills deal [15 - 35]%%[x] bonus damage.

name: Stable Aspect
description: While Unstable Currents is not active, your Shock Skills have a [6.5 - 17.0]%% chance to trigger a free cast from it.

name: Aspect of Sundered Ground
description: Every 20 seconds, your next Upheaval cast is guaranteed to Overpower and deals [50 - 70]%%[x] increased damage. Upheaval Critical Strikes against Elites reduce this timer by 1 second.

name: Tormentor's Aspect
description: Enemies who move while Poisoned by you additionally take [50 - 250]%% of your Thorns damage per second.

name: High Velocity Aspect
description: Barrage arrows now pierce through 1 enemy.Barrage has [10.0 - 30.0]%%[+] increased Attack Speed.

name: Detonating
description: +[2 - 3] to Fireball

name: Aspect of the Firebird
description: Gain the Flame Shield Enchantment for free. When Flame Shield activates, Meteorites fall around you dealing [75 - 135] Fire damage.

name: Starving Ravager's  Aspect
description: Ravager no longer has a duration and instead drains [14 - 4] Vigor every second until depleted. Effects which extend Ravager instead generate Vigor.

name: Aspect of Iron Rain
description: Smoke Grenade has a 100%% chance to create an Arrow Storm where it explodes, dealing [120 - 360] Physical damage over 3 seconds. Your Arrow Storms continuously apply Vulnerable.

name: Aspect of Soil Power
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 25%%[+] chance to create a Mystic Circle for 10 seconds. Casting a Centipede Skill in Mystic Circles empowers them to periodically apply [270 - 375] Poisoning damage over 6 seconds to enemies within while extending any Crowd Controls affecting them.

name: Death Wish Aspect
description: Gain [445 - 572] Thorns while Berserking.

name: Veteran Brawler's Aspect
description: Each time a Core Skill deals direct damage to an enemy, your next Charge, Leap, or Kick deals [4.0 - 10.0]%%[x] increased damage, up to [20 - 50]%%[x].

name: Overcharged Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a [15 - 31]%% chance when dealing Lightning damage to overload the target for 3 seconds, causing any direct damage you deal to them to pulse [180 - 300] additional damage to surrounding enemies.

name: Aspect of Frenzied Dead
description: Each time one of your Minions damages an enemy, they gain [10.0 - 18.0]%%[+] Attack Speed for 3 seconds, up to [30.0 - 54.0]%%[+].

name: Splintering Aspect
description: Bone Spear's primary attack makes enemies hit beyond the first Vulnerable for 3 seconds. Bone Shards from Bone Spear deal [30 - 70]%% bonus damage to Vulnerable enemies and pierce them.

name: Coldbringer's Aspect
description: Every 8 seconds, your Skeletal Mages cast a blizzard that deals [135 - 180] Cold damage and continuously Chills enemies for 8%% over 6 seconds.

name: Fusillade
description: +2 to Barrage

name: Ballistic Aspect
description: When you have Fortify your Earth Skills gain +2 Ranks.

name: Repeating Aspect
description: Rapid Fire has a [30 - 50]%% chance to ricochet to another target.

name: Osseous Gale Aspect
description: Bone Storm consumes up to 8 Corpses to increase its duration by up to [5.0 - 15.0] seconds.

name: Caustic
description: +[10.0 - 15.0]%% Imbued Critical Strike Damage

name: Joint Splitter's
description: +[10.0 - 15.0]%% Bone Critical Strike Damage

name: Aspect of Gore Quills
description: Casting Blood Lance will consume Blood Orbs to also conjure lances from them. Each additional Blood Lance deals [40 - 80]%% of normal damage and prioritizes targeting un-lanced enemies.

name: Shard of Dawn Aspect
description: After 30 seconds of Night's Grasp, gain Dawn's Haste, increasing your Attack Speed by [20 - 40]%% and Movement Speed by 20%% for 12 seconds. While empowered by the Midwinter Ward, killing an enemy reduces Night's Grasp's duration by 1 second.

name: Lucky Hit Resource UNIQUE
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15%% Chance to Restore +[9.5 - 14.5]%% Primary Resource

name: Aspect of the Flaming Rampage
description: Charge gains an additional Charge. Each target hit by it explodes for [104 - 194] Fire damage to surrounding enemies.

name: Aspect of Infestation
description: Lucky Hit: Centipede Skills have up to a 35%% chance to spawn a Pestilent Swarm from the target which deals [53 - 113] Poison damage per hit.Pestilent Swarms now also deal 100%% of their Base damage as Poisoning damage over 6 seconds.

name: Aspect of Bristling Vengeance
description: Payback now echoes forward and additionally deals [90 - 130]%% of your Thorns damage to enemies.

name: Aspect of the Moonrise
description: Damaging an enemy with a Basic Skill grants you 4%% Attack Speed for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum stacks, you enter a Vampiric Bloodrage, gaining [40 - 100]%%[x] Basic Skill damage and 15%% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

name: Aspect of Retribution
description: Distant enemies have a 10%% chance to be Stunned for 2 seconds when they hit you. You deal [15 - 35]%%[x] increased damage to Stunned or Knocked Down enemies.

name: Dire Wolf's Aspect
description: Grizzly Rage is now a Werewolf Skill and Shapeshifts you into a Dire Werewolf. Dire Werewolves gain [10 - 30]%%[+] Movement Speed and [20 - 60]%% Spirit Cost Reduction instead of Damage Reduction. In addition, kills Heal you for 10%% of your Maximum Life.

description: Deal [5 - 13]%%[x] increased damage. Triple this bonus after standing still for 3 seconds.
